special_text:
[+2]: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
[0]: Kisaragi Kasen deals damage equal to her loyalty to target creature an opponent controls. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Kisaragi Kasen.
[0]: If you both own and control Kisaragi Kasen, the Vessel and a creature named Izanami, Storied Empress, exile them, then meld them into Izanami Kasen, As One.
special_text2:
[+3]: Create three 1/1 black Skeleton creature tokens with menace.
[0]: Search your library and/or graveyard for a card and put it in your hand. If you searched your library this way, shuffle. The next spell you cast this turn costs {3} less to cast.
[-1]: Exile target permanent.
[-13]: Target opponent chooses up to one creature they control, then sacrifices all other nonland permanents they control.
[-13]: Target opponent chooses up to one creature they control, then sacrifices all other nonland permanents they control.
